text: ettu inakale (avan srsticcirikkunnu.) cem'mariyatil ninn rantum, kealatil ninn rantum. parayuka: (ava rantileyum) anvargannaleyanea, atalla, penvargannaleyanea, atumalla penvargannalute garbhasayannal ulkeantatineyanea allahu nisid'dhamakkiyittullatâ€Œ? arivinre atisthanattil ninnal enikk parannutaru; ninnal satyavanmaranenkil
